description:
Desk Assistant, the ORIGINAL Swiss Army Knife of utilities, is extremely useful at work, home & school. It is fully supported on the Veer, Pre 2, Pre, and Pixi.  These are tools for finance, conversions, computer utilities, area codes, zipcodes, timeszones, and mailing/tracking.

Version 1.2.0 now includes a currency conversion section for more than more than 150 countries' currency.

See our website for a lot more detailed info on the capabilities. Checkout the help file which is a duplicate of the help file found in the app.

http://mysite.verizon.net/charlie.santos/cesassociates

Here's the highlights of the functionality found in this app: 
o TIPPING AND FINANCE
-- How much to Tip
-- Loan monthly payment
-- Credit Card costs
-- Savings
-- Currency Conversion

o MEASUREMENT CONVERSION
-- Length
-- Temperature
-- Weight
-- Liquid Measure
-- Dry Measure
-- Area
-- Angles
-- Date Arithmetic

o FIND A DATE
-- Add days to a date
-- Subtract days from a date
-- Number of days between two dates

o FRACTION/DECIMAL CONVERSION
-- Convert fraction to decimal
-- Convert decimal to fraction
---- (round to nearest useful measurement fraction)

o CALCULATE SIZE OF AN AREA
-- Circle
-- Square
-- Rectangle
-- Equilateral Triangle
-- Right Triangle
-- Scalene Triangle
-- Parallelogram
-- Trapezoid

o COMPUTER UTILITIES
-- Convert between number bases
-- Convert character to Ascii
-- Convert Ascii to character

o AREA CODES
-- Area Code/Prefix lookup

o TIME ZONES
-- Local time for many US Cities
-- Links to popular World Cities
-- World Timezone Map

o ZIP CODES
-- Find zip code link

o US POST OFFICE
-- USPS utilities link

o FEDEX
-- FedEx utilities link

o UPS
-- UPS utilities link
versionNote: Added Bushels to Dry Measure converter.
